amendment.description: To ensure the viability of small businesses by helping them provide to their employees access to quality child care.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4244 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4244 proposed by Senator Conrad for Senator Roberts. (consideration: CR S2064-2067; text: CR S2064) To ensure the viability of small businesses by helping them provide to their employees access to quality child care.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4244 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4244 proposed by Senator Conrad for Senator Roberts.
